pr_title: #695 Check for direct assignment for iterable, stream or map types

timeline.message: #695 Check for direct assignment for iterable, stream or map types should be done on their type parameters instead of the types themselves

timeline.bodyText: should we test a stream as well?
timeline.author: sjaakd

replies.bodyText: It wouldn't hurt, but let's leave it as is for now. I think both cases are covered
replies.author: filiphr
